decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The operations would consist of the enlargement of a dwelling house within the meaning of Class B of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class B. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 2 - The operations would consist of any other alteration to the roof of the dwelling house within the meaning of Class C of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class C. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 3 - The operations would consist of the enlargement of a dwelling house within the meaning of Class E of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in Class E. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 4 - INFORMATIVE 
Please note that this Certificate is issued on the basis that the outbuilding will only be used for purposes incidental to the enjoyment of the main dwelling house and for no other purpose. The use of the building for separate living/sleeping accommodation or business purposes would require the grant of planning permission.
description: APPLICATION FOR A LAWFUL DEVELOPMENT CERTIFICATE IN RESPECT OF THE PROPOSED HIP TO GABLE CONVERSION , ERECTION OF REAR ROOF EXTENSION INSERTION OF ROOF LIGHTS TO FRONT ROOF SLOPE AND ERECTION OF OUTBUILDING
